language_rtl.label: Languages support RTL
language_rtl.info: Leave blank if you want to apply to all languages. Separate your ISO codes if you want apply to some one languages ar; fa; ku; pa; sd

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.info: Logo width is automatically optimized for mobile.

background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

font.label: Font
font.info: Select a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

font.label: Font
font.info: Select a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

hover_effect.label: Hover effect
hover_effect.info: Affects hover cards such as: product, banner, collection, blog...

show_rate.label: Show rate
show_rate.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

show_video_featured.label: Show video as featured image
show_video_featured.info: Video must be first in media list and hosted on Shopify.

show_quick_add_mobile.label: Show quick add button on mobile

new_badge_display_period.label: New badge display period
new_badge_display_period.info: Choose how long products are labeled as 'New' from the day they are created.

custom_badge.label: Custom badge
custom_badge.info: Please follow the document to see [how to setup custom badge](#)

color_swatch_trigger.label: Color swatch trigger
color_swatch_trigger.info: Define the name of color option. Separate by a comma. Eg. Color,Colour

color_swatch_custom.label: Custom colors
color_swatch_custom.info: Valid format: Muesli: #ddd5bc or Muesli: image.png separate by a comma

free_shipping.label: Free shipping message
free_shipping.paragraph: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates.](/admin/settings/shipping)

message.label: Message
message.info: Utilize [amount] to track your advancement towards qualifying for free shipping.

minimum_amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
minimum_amount.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters.

product_recommendations.label: Product recommendations
product_recommendations.heading: Heading
product_recommendations.enable_product_recommendations_info: Product recommendations will be shown on the mini cart and cart page.

select_product_gift_wrap.label: Select product gift wrap
select_product_gift_wrap.info: Only works with products without variants.

collection.label: Collection list
collection.info: Collections will display their featured image by default. Use metafield to change image and text. Learn more

popular_keywords.label: Popular search
popular_keywords.info: Recommend popular searched keywords in your store to customers. For example: t-shirt, dress, black.

products_recommended.label: Products recommendation
products_recommended.info: Select a product to recommend for customers.

predictive_search.label: Enable predictive search
predictive_search.info: Live search results. Not available in all languages. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/navigation-search/search/predictive-search#general-requirements-and-limitations)

show_code.label: Show currency codes
show_code.info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.info: To edit all your theme's colors, go to your color theme settings.

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.
desktop_content_position.info_2: Content first is the default mobile layout.

group.label: Group
group.info: Group content to show on the same position.

padding_inline.label: Padding inline
padding_inline.info: Padding inline is automatically optimized for mobile.

padding_block.label: Padding block
padding_block.info: Padding block is automatically optimized for mobile.

description.label: Page description
description.info: Leave the description blank empty to use default page description

enable_rounded_style.label: Enable rounded style
enable_rounded_style.info: Only work when the announcement bar exists in the header group, above the header.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image.label: Image
image.info_width: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

desktop_position.label: Desktop image position
desktop_position.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image width is automatically optimized for mobile.

enable_carousel.label: Enable carousel
enable_carousel.description: Carousel shows only when total collections is larger than the items per row on desktop.
enable_carousel.description_media: Carousel shows only when total media is larger than the items per row on desktop.

show_pagination.label: Show pagination
show_pagination.info: Navigation will automatically be shown on mobile

reveal_slide.label: Reveal next slide
reveal_slide.info: Display a part of the upcoming slide.

show_text_bellow.label: Show text below on mobile
show_text_bellow.info: Text will be shown below image on mobile.

settings.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

size_guide.heading: Size chart
size_guide.info: Get size chart information from selected page.

size_trigger.label: Size chart trigger
size_trigger.info: Define the name of size option. Separate by a comma. Eg. Size,Misurare

custom_size_guide.label: Custom size chart
custom_size_guide.info__1: Using specific size charts for each collection or product.
custom_size_guide.info__2: To use a custom size charts for product or collection, create metafield with namespace and key: "custom.size_chart".[Learn more](https://nextsky-doc.gitbook.io/angle/theme-installation/create-required-metafields#id-3.-size-chart)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Set this value to alert customers when a product is about to go out of stock.

inventory_base.label: Inventory base quantity
inventory_base.info: Set the initial quantity of your product inventory for progress bar.

show_transfer_notice.label: Show inventory transfer notice
show_transfer_notice.info: Learn how to create inventory transfers [here](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/inventory/transfers/create-transfer)

social_icon.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

country_language.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets). To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_follow.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

newsletter_block.name: Newsletter
newsletter_block.info: Subscribers are automatically added to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

show_bg_social.label: Show the background of social icons.

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

logo_position.label: Desktop logo position
logo_position.info: Logo position is automatically optimized for mobile.

transparent.info: Ensure the first section on your homepage is configured as one of the following: a Slideshow, a Video with a text overlay, or an Image with a text overlay.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Enter menu item to apply a mega menu dropdown. Please distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters. [Learn more.]()

custom_liquid.name: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image.label: Image
image.info: Leave blank to use collection's image

title.label: Title
title.info: Leave blank to use collection's title

settings.paragraph: This section allows you to customize the quickview popup.

max_width.label: Max width
max_width.info: Max width is automatically optimized for mobile.

message.label: Expired message
message.info: This message will be displayed when the time has expired.

video_local.label: Video local
video_local.info: If you upload both video url and local video, the local video will be used.

alt_description.label: Video alt text
alt_description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

autoplay.label: Video auto play
autoplay.info: Videos are muted automatically to allow autoplay

show_text_bellow.label: Show text bellow video on mobile
show_text_bellow.info: Text will be shown below video on mobile.

header__1.info: Edit your logo in theme settings

video_height.label: Video height
video_height.info: Video is automatically optimized for mobile.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

enable_tags.label: Enable filtering
enable_tags.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

settings.info: To display the cart drawer, please go to Theme settings and select Drawer as the cart type in the cart settings.

show_free_shipping_message.label: Show free shipping message
show_free_shipping_message.info: Set the minimum amount for Free Shipping in the theme settings.

show_gift_wrap.label: Show gift wrap
show_gift_wrap.info: Please select gift wrap products in the theme settings.

enable_sticky_desktop.label: Enable sticky add cart on desktop

thumbnail_carousel_setting.label: Thumbnail carousel setting
thumbnail_carousel_setting.info: This setting only works when you choose the Thumbnail Carousel for the desktop layout.

media_position.label: Desktop media position
media_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

media_width.label: Desktop media width
media_width.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

mobile_thumbnails.info: Mobile thumbnail only shows when desktop layout is thumbnail carousel.

variant_image_group.label: Enable variant image group
variant_image_group.info: This option only works with color variants.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Videos are muted automatically to allow autoplay. Won't work for YouTube/Vimeo.

mobile-navigation-bar.name: Mobile navigation bar
mobile-navigation-bar.info: This section only shows on mobile. Please switch to mobile view.

settings_map.info_iframe: You can get google embed map iframe [here](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop)

width.label: Media width
width.info: It only works when Left is selected in the Desktop image position setting
